profileAlternative.name: Anoop Martin
profileAlternative.headline: Software Developer Intern at Hewlett Packard Enterprise
profileAlternative.summary:
TECHNICAL SKILLS

• Programming Languages: C, C++, Python, Java, Visual Basic, Perl, Tcl, Linux Shell,

• Web Technologies: JavaScript, Node, HTML, CSS, React, REST.

• Database: MySQL, MongoDB, SQLite.

• Machine Learning: TensorFlow, Keras, Scikit.

• Tools: Git, SVN, Junit, JMeter, JSON Web Token.

• Additional Skills: Full Stack Development, Data Structures and Algorithms, Machine Learning(completed certification course in ML by Cognixia with high marks)



Projects

Automated early detection of diabetic retinopathy SJSU Fall 2018

·Compared the performance of major models like SVM, KNN and deep learning techniques to detect diabetic retinopathy

·Used TensorFlow library for Deep Learning and Scikit-learn for SVM and KNN implementation

Real Time Object Detection Using YOLO algorithm Fall 2018

·Implemented You Only Look Once (YOLO) for object detection with a class size of 20 objects

Canvas: an LMS Web Application, SJSU Spring 2019

·Canvas, a replica of Canvas Application, which is a cloud based Learning Management System (Web Application)

Technologies : React, Node.js ,Express, JMeter.

·Developed a cloud based solution which allows Students to access their academic resources and schedules of assignments and Teachers to publish study materials and grades

·Used MySQL which helped in improving search experiences on the website.

·Utilized connection pooling which allows access to app services upto 1k concurrent users.

·Usage of latest ES6 JS features like async-await, arrow functions etc which results in better maintenance code structure

·Used JMeter for successfully testing the API’s.
